short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HabroSanitizer hides posts in the feed written by unwanted authors or companies on Habr.com (habrahabr). Free, no ads, no telemetry.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HabroSanitizer removes posts on Habr.com using your personal ban list. Supports blocking by author, by blog name or hub name. It's opensource, ads and telemetry free.
